title: Mrs Reynolds needs a nurse
creator_credit: Robert Anderson Associates and Robert Anderson
brief_description: Recreates an actual case history of a long-term patient who is demanding and difficult to handle. Once the staff examine their attitudes toward Mrs Reynolds and the reasons behind her behaviour, the nursing time required drops. Explores some of the fundamentals of professional nursing.
